value.string:
Const xlMaximized = -4137
Dim XL
Dim Cell

Cell = WScript.Arguments(0)
Set XL = GetObject(,"Excel.Application")
XL.Windows(1).WindowState = xlMaximized
XL.Range(""&Cell&"").Interior.ColorIndex=3
Find Start and End of the Payable Transactions Table
Check for Expense Account VAT Rate Code
Check for Expense Account VAT Rate
Check for Expense Account VAT Rate for 5% STANDARD VAR
Check for Expense Account VAT Rate for EXEMPTED, 0%RATED and OUT OF SCOPE
Validate the VAT Recoverable Amount as a percentage of Line Amount
Read Payable Transactions record and Validate the VAT

value.expression: SELECT F14 from [Sheet1$$A10:$vCell$]  where F11 =$vSpecialAccount$ AND F19>$vCutOffDate$ GROUP BY(F14)
SELECT count(*) from [Sheet1$$A10:$vCell$]  where F11 =$vSpecialAccount$ AND F19>$vCutOffDate$ AND F14=$vPayatbleTransactionsRecord[0]$ AND F24='OUT OF SCOPE'

value.string: Read Payable Transactions for SPECIAL Expense Account
